name: Animated running character
description:
A simple animated character running endlessly.

This was made with Figma's prototype feature and smoothly animated with Smart Animate.


  • The little buddy is animated through 6 sprites, all vector made. I kept the amount of sprite low so that it's easy to customize.
  • A few color styles will allow you to customize the color very easily.
  • The file contains two starting frames, one showing the little character upscaled and the other one in the context of a page (loading/progress bar).


It's a 30min first draft. I hope to improve it! So please comment if you have any idea to make this better. :)
